repl_description:
A sophisticated mobile-first news aggregation platform with advanced file management and robust backup capabilities, designed to enhance content delivery and system resilience.

Key Technologies:
• Backend: Flask, PostgreSQL with secure authentication
• Frontend: Vanilla JavaScript, Responsive Design
• Advanced Features: GPT-powered content analysis, automated backup systems
• Mobile Optimization: Touch-gesture handling, adaptive content rendering
• Data Visualization: Plotly.js for dynamic representations
• Security: Encrypted backup storage with granular user permissions
